text: I have allowed two submissions for assignment 1, though of course any submission you make now will be marked late. Generally speaking, we have just one submission allowed for an assignment.
Some of you have asked for the assignments to be more relevant to the quizzes. It’s hard to achieve this given the schedule, however. I will see if there’s a way that it can be done.

I have posted assignment 2. Its due date is next Wednesday at midnight so you have a week. This assignment will definitely help prepare you for next Tuesday’s quiz. Some aspects of it might be tricky until you have heard the second lecture on Union-Find later this week.
Actually, I’ve changed the availability until tomorrow.
